author: draganrakita
content: On CALL action if execution reverts, should delegated account stay as warm loaded (target account stays warm)?  Would assume yes.

author: draganrakita
content: And would need one clarification, if tx to is pointing to eip7702 bytecode do we charge additional gas for delegated bytecode load?

author: lightclient
content: it should follow the same behavior as CALL does today for a normal target, which i assume is keep it warm

author: lightclient
content: i'm inclined to leave it as-is and just consider it paid for out of the general 21000 cost of originating the transaction
